product_name: Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap
long_description: From the creators of the first Bluetooth(R) heart rate monitor comes the Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor chest strap. Its easy-to-use design makes tracking your training simple and fun. Dual-band technology (ANT+ and Bluetooth enabled) connects to both smartphones and GPS watches to track your heart rate and calories burned in real-time while you exercise. 2 LED lights indicate the TICKR connection to your watch or device, and heart rate detection. Available for free with the Wahoo Fitness App, the 8-week Burn & Burst Training Program(TM) was designed by Wahoo physiologists to burn fat and improve performance. Works seamlessly with over 50 iPhone apps including Runkeeper, Strava, MapMyFitness and Cyclemeter/Runmeter. Supported devices include iPhone 4S or newer, select Androids (download Wahoo Fitness app to see if compatible) and ANT+ compatible GPS watches and bike computers. The Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor chest strap features a replaceable coin cell battery that lasts up to 12 mos.
short_description: From the creators of the first Bluetooth(R) heart rate monitor comes the Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor chest strap. Its easy-to-use design makes tracking your training simple and fun.
